If you prefer to have a premium sedan you may go for Honda Civic and if you prefer to have a spacious SUV for rugged usage, then the Jeep Compass is a good choice. For a detailed comparison, follow the below link - Compare. Moreover, you may have a test drive of the cars for a better idea of comfort and drive quality by visiting the nearest dealer in your city - Dealers.
